attributes.action: abolish charges made by Doctors to sign health related forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently some patients are charged up to £30 by their Doctor to a form confirming their health status. Such forms are required by some weight loss programmes such as the Cambridge Diet. In times of spiraling levels of obesity, its seems absurd for people to be charged when they are trying to improve their health. Losing weight must only save the NHS money in the long run.
